TypeSignature.Value: .class public interface auto ansi abstract IExplorerNodeTypeProvider

summary.span: 提供“服务器资源管理器”的“SharePoint 连接”节点层次结构中新类型节点的定义。

span.span: Provides the definition of a new type of node in the **SharePoint Connections** hierarchy of nodes in **Server Explorer**.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 实现此接口可创建新的节点类型。Implement this interface to create a new type of node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将自定义 SharePoint 节点添加到服务器资源管理器](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer)。For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer). 实现此接口的类必须包括和通过 Visual Studio 来发现。Classes that implement this interface must include the and the to be discovered by Visual Studio. ## Examples |日期Date|历史记录History|原因Reason| |----------|-------------|------------| |[!INCLUDE[dev10_cpub1](~/includes/dev10-cpub1-md.md)]|其中包含指向演示如何实现此接口的主题添加了新注释Added new remarks with links to topics that show how to implement this interface|[!INCLUDE[enhancement](~/includes/enhancement-md.md)]|

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig newslot virtual instance void InitializeType(class Microsoft.VisualStudio.SharePoint.Explorer.IExplorerNodeTypeDefinition typeDefinition) cil managed

span.span: The definition of the new node type.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 可以处理事件和设置的属性`typeDefinition`参数定义的节点的行为。You can handle events and set properties of the `typeDefinition` parameter to define the behavior of the node. 例如，可以指定的图标或文本节点，并可以处理以下事件：For example, you can specify the icon or text for the node, and you can handle the following events: - ： 处理此事件，以便将新的子节点添加到节点。: Handle this event to add new child nodes to the node. 有关详细信息，请参阅[如何： 将自定义 SharePoint 节点添加到服务器资源管理器](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer)。For more information, see [How to: Add a Custom SharePoint Node to Server Explorer](/visualstudio/sharepoint/how-to-add-a-custom-sharepoint-node-to-server-explorer). - ： 处理此事件，以便将自定义的快捷菜单项添加到节点。: Handle this event to add a custom shortcut menu item to the node. - ： 处理此事件，以便将自定义属性添加到节点。: Handle this event to add custom properties to the node. 属性将显示在**属性**窗口时选择的节点。The properties appear in the **Properties** window when the node is selected. 此方法为每个调用一次实现。This method is called once for each implementation.
